item.title: CVE-2023-48738|2023-12-19T20:47:07.931Z -- porto%20theme -- porto%20theme%20-%20functionality
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Porto Theme Porto Theme - Functionality.This issue affects Porto Theme - Functionality: from n/a before 2.12.1.
